import './App.css'; import Header from './components/header'; import Footer from './components/footer'; import { MapContainer, TileLayer, useMap } from 'react-leaflet'; import { Marker, Popup } from 'react-leaflet'; import React from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { fetchComposts } from './app/CompostSlice'; function Map() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const composts = useSelector(state => state.compost.list); useEffect(() => { dispatch( fetchComposts() ); }, [dispatch]); const position = [composts.adress.lat, composts.adress.lng]; return (
